verbs.description: The White House aide [V: was] reportedly responding to John McCain 's rejection of President Trump 's nominee to head the CIA .
[ARG0: The White House aide] was [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: responding] [ARG1: to John McCain 's rejection of President Trump 's nominee to head the CIA] .
The White House aide was reportedly responding to John McCain 's rejection of [ARG0: President Trump 's] nominee to [V: head] [ARG1: the CIA] .
